text: @realDonaldTrump You killed 80,000 Americans because you’re a Fake! it’s now obvious! We’ll have  100,000 death by 5/30. You’re losing! You blew it when you Ignored the 10 briefings on dangers of Coronavirus hitting our shores last year in December! You destroyed our economy & country! Ur legacy!
